body.name: 4.2 QT Air Fryer Oven Cooker with Temperature and Time Control, 2 Independent Frying Baskets, Pizza Pan, Dishwasher Non-stick Basket 6 Cook Presets CE Certified Black (Black-Knob)
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
features: What’s Included: Countertop Air Fryer Oven, Air Fry Basket, Fryer Pot, Pizza Pan, Removable Partition that cook two different flavor, 6 preset menus let you cook chicken, pizza, steak, fish, drumstick at the perfect preset time (0-30 Minutes) and temperature (170°F-400°F).
Healthier：360°hot air circulation around the food instead of oil deep fry to reduce fat by 70-80% without sacrificing food flavor,make food crispy on the outside and tender on the inside!
4.2 QT Capacity: Can provide enough space to cook food for 2-4 family members. And it has a compact design that takes up less space in any kitchen.
Easy Use and Easy Cleanup：Simply load the fryer basket, set the temp and timer, your food comes out crispy. With nonstick, dishwasher-safe baskets, easily cleanup after cooking.
Safer: 30 mins timer automatically shut off and over heating protection function prevents overcooking,makes it safer to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this thing
reviews.reviewText: I bought this air fryer after the one I had died on me mid chicken nugget bake. It's the first one I've had with a digital timer and temp. It's the least expensive one I could find (and was comfortable with) for the size capacity I needed. I am absolutely in love. It works perfectly, and it doesn't put off too much heat from the vent. (I might've slightly melted some blinds with my previous air fryer, so this is an important feature for me). I can't say enough good about it and if you're in the market for one, which you are because you're reading reviews, I totally recommend this model. I would definitely buy another one. Oh! It cleans up real easily too. My previous model was terrible to clean, but the tray easily lifts out of this one and the outside is sleek, making it simple to wipe down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Seems to his great. I’ve used it a number of times on different foods. They come out very crispy and warm. Just have to keep an ion it so it doesn’t overcook. The quality of the case is a little weak. You have to really work the door in order for it to close properly, but I would recommend it great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great so far!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had it about a month. I’m disabled so working an oven is really hard for me. I love using this. It’s very easy. You just have to figure out temps and times. Once you get the hang of it (I’m still working on that lol) it makes a quick meal or frozen food taste like fresh (French fries for example). If you put in cut up tortilla shells you get great chips. I made some salsa and cheese dip. It was so easy and tasty. I would recommend getting an air fryer. This is a great value even just to try it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Air fryer!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great addition to any kitchen, and I highly recommend it to anyone who loves to cook or wants to eat healthier. This air fryer is incredibly easy to use, with intuitive temperature and time controls that make it easy to cook all kinds of delicious meals.One of the standout features of this air fryer is its non-stick basket, which makes cleaning up a breeze. The LED digital touch screen is also a great feature, as it allows you to easily see the temperature and time settings, as well as the remaining cooking time.The LATURE air fryer comes with eight preset cooking options, which makes it easy to cook all kinds of meals, from crispy chicken wings to roasted vegetables. Plus, it's CE certified, so you can trust that it's safe to use.Overall, I'm really impressed with the LATURE 4.2 QT Air Fryer Oven Cooker. It's easy to use, easy to clean, and makes cooking healthy meals a breeze. If you're in the market for an air fryer, I definitely recommend giving this one a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Meets all expectations
reviews.reviewText: I like the size and simplicity. Oddly, it was one of the larger models to choose from, but it still seems a bit small. VERY happy I didn’t go smaller. It’s plenty big for what I do, and doesn’t take up a lot of counter space. I like that it’s super simple- set the temp and the time and that’s it. It’s very quiet. Overall it’s 5 star product. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my parents for Christmas, they love it and use it all the time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact it is a fun size and works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Glad I bought!
reviews.reviewText: I've been wanting an air fryer for years and finally got it! I'm so glad I made thedecisionto do so! Because I rather use this to reheat fried foods rather than my toaster. It really gives my food back the crispiness it once had! Now, I wanted to experiment cooking fried chic tenders just like I do in the skillet. I used flour, but it did not turn out right at all! 🫣 Second batch I cooked without the flour was much better! This thing heats up quickly, and it gets the job done! Honestly, I started to purchase the liners, but I experimented using foil and works just fine..lol
It’s simple to use, comes with a good booklet and is a perfect size.

Die LATURE 4L Heißluftfritteuse verspricht mit ihrer umfangreichen Ausstattung – von Temperatur- und Zeitsteuerung über zwei unabhängige Frittierkörbe bis zur Pizzapfanne – ein vielseitiges Kocherlebnis. Die antihaftbeschichteten Körbe sollen zudem die Reinigung erleichtern, und die 6 Kochvoreinstellungen sowie der Black-Knopf versprechen Benutzerfreundlichkeit. Leider war meine persönliche Erfahrung mit diesem Gerät eher enttäuschend.Die Fritteuse kam in gebrauchtem Zustand an, was bereits einen negativen Start darstellte. Nach den ersten beiden Anwendungen stellte sich heraus, dass das Gerät nicht mehr ordnungsgemäß funktionierte. Der Black-Knopf, der die Hauptsteuerung darstellt, schien seine Funktion verloren zu haben. Dies führte zu Frust und Unannehmlichkeiten, da die grundlegenden Funktionen der Heißluftfritteuse nicht mehr nutzbar waren.Die Tatsache, dass das Gerät nach so kurzer Nutzungsdauer seinen Dienst versagte, wirft ernsthafte Fragen zur Qualität und Haltbarkeit auf. In Anbetracht des Preises und der vollmundigen Versprechungen bezüglich der Funktionen war die Erfahrung mit der LATURE 4L Heißluftfritteuse enttäuschend. Dieses Produkt scheint möglicherweise nicht die zuverlässige und langlebige Lösung zu sein, die es verspricht.

Die Wärmeleitung ist sehr gut und es wird schnell warm .Das Gerät hat schönes Design .Man kann Mit dem Touchscreen das Gewünschte Programm auswählen ( Es gibt voreingestellte Programme für verschiedene Lebensmittel ).und man kann auch die Zeit und Temperatur nach Gewünschte auswählen und ändern .Die Bedingung ist einfachDie Reinigung ist Einfache und schnelle .Ich finde es praktisch und gut .Ich bin zufrieden .

The media could not be loaded. Die Heißluftfritteuse sieht super aus und die Qualität ist OK. Sie ist super leicht zu bedienen und bietet viel Platz. Es lassen sich super leckere Speisen ohne großen Aufwand zubereiten. Durch die Abtrennung ist es möglich gleichzeitig verschiedene Lebensmittel zuzubereiten. Leider ist die Anleitung nur auf Englisch dabei.Pro:- super Optik- leicht zu bedienen- es könne mehrere Speisen gleichzeitig zubereitet werden- sehr gute ErgebnisseKontra:- die Abtrennung ist leider sehr wackelig- Anleitung leider nur auf EnglischFazit:Ein super Gerät welches wir sehr gerne nutzen! Durch die leichte Bedienung ist die englische Anleitung auch nicht so schlimm.
